divs: Sighting DetailsNear or around 7:35 pm on 12-14-09 My mother and I were coming back from the Town of Cedar Creek heading toward Whiteriver and just across the local landfill there is a clearing and a mountain that is high and rugged. So just as we drive up this hill over the trees I suddely see 2 huge I mean Huge lights that i have never seen before and just i notice that there are 2 of them another turns on and joins the the other two that are hovering. At that point there was anther car that had just passed me and it stopped behind me. As I watched my mother notices it and i slow down to stop and i see the mountain side is the color of these objects the kind of color that i have not seen. Now all of this happen within 10 seconds. It happen so fast and suddenly that it Startled me and my mother. I didn't know what to do so i called our local PD. But, this 3 huge ember lights have appeared there before to the best of my knowledge. Even our local PD have stated that this wasn't thier first time being called out the the same spot.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cedar Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 Red Orange colored lights over mountian illuminating mountian side
